product.name: Escala

product.description: Gigi is the ultimate fantasy gown. A fluid sequin sheath features a fitted V-neck bodice with open back and delicate gathered straps. The skirt has a billowing layered tulle overlay from the waist for the ultimate sparkling, whimsical movement.

product.description:
Ready to show off some legs? This is the dress for you!

Megan is heavy georgette dress with tri-cups, double straps, cheeky cut-out at bodice. The sides and part of the back is exposed with delicate strap detailing. The skirt has panelling and two front thigh-high splits created from overlapping panels. Not for the faint of heart!
product.name: Megan

product.name: Megan

product.description: Designed to fit and flatter. The Borealis is a matte satin gown featuring a draped, faux-wrap bodice; crossover back straps; and a thigh high split. It has an invisible zipper and hook and eye closure.
product.name: The Borealis

product.description: Designed to fit and flatter. The Borealis is a matte satin gown featuring a draped, faux-wrap bodice; crossover back straps; and a thigh high split. It has an invisible zipper and hook and eye closure.
product.name: The Borealis

product.description:
There's no rules - go for it.

Kendall is a reversed matte satin dress you will need in your wardrobe. It has long, double-layer multi-way straps that will give you endless variations to style with. It has a relaxed fit and two front side splits.
product.name: Kendall Multi-Way

product.description:

product.description: The ultimate in softer elegance, this Escala matte satin dress has a crossover neckline with open back, empire cut from the bodice, wide yoke on hips, full floor-length skirt with front thigh-split and flowing train. Glamorous draping and pleats make this dress a show-stopper.
product.fabric:
Main: 100% polyester matte satin

Lining: 100% polyester matte satin
product.fit: Nickayla wears a size AU6/US2 and skirt standard length, her measurements are: Bust: 84cmWaist: 61cmHips: 88cmHeight: 180cm
product.style_notes: Bring modern sophistication with sleek blowdried hair and a vintage inspired drop pendant necklace. Balance with a classic cocktail ring.
